snippet.title: Sea of Thieves: The Legend of Monkey Island - Official Release Trailer | Xbox Games Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
From Rare and Lucasfilm comes a crossover between Sea of Thieves and Monkey Island. Sea of Thieves: The Legend of Monkey Island brings back Guybrush Threepwood and other classic characters and will arrive on July 20, 2023 for Xbox.

#IGN #Xbox #SoG
